abstract: When a person sends me an e-mail with their contact info, what’s the easiest way to get it into Outlook’s Contacts automatically?
snippet: When a person sends me an e-mail with their contact info, what’s the easiest way to get it into Outlook’s Contacts automatically?
lead_paragraph: Q. I use Outlook. When a person sends me an e-mail with their name, phone number and address information at the bottom of the e-mail, what’s the easiest way to get all that information into Outlook’s Contacts automatically? It ought to be simple, but this is Microsoft.
